query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZLET017 ( MANDT, ZBELN, ZOSNR, POSID2, POST1, BDTER, EL_ATYP, EL_ZAFQ, AUFNR, KTEXT, PSPID, EXTWG, RSNUM, RSPOS, MATNR, MAKTX, ZMTART, MATNR_NM, SPEC, ZSIZE, ERFMG, ENMNG, PRLAB, LFIMG, ERFME, LGORT, LGOBE, LGORT2, LGOBE2, KUNNR, NAME1, WADAT, VSTEL, KUNWE, VKORG, VTWEG, SPART, VBELN, POSNR, ZSTAT1, ZSTAT2, ZSTAT3, ZSTAT4, ZLOG1, ZLOG2, ZLOG3, ERNAM, ERDAT, UZEIT, LZONE, ZCANC, ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, AENAM, LAEDA, CHANGE_TIME, MJAHR, MATKL, ERDAT_2 ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, ' ', ' ', #POSID2#, #POST1#, #BDTER#, #EL_ATYP#, #EL_ZAFQ#, #AUFNR#, #KTEXT#, #PSPID#, #EXTWG#, #RSNUM#, #RSPOS#, #MATNR#, #MAKTX#, #ZMTART#, #MATNR_NM#, #SPEC#, #ZSIZE#, CAST(#ERFMG# AS DEC(13,3)), CAST(#ENMNG# AS DEC(13,3)), CAST(#PRLAB# AS DEC(13,3)), CAST(#LFIMG# AS DEC(13,3)), #ERFME#, #LGORT#, #LGOBE#, #LGORT2#, #LGOBE2#, #KUNNR#, #NAME1#, #WADAT#, #VSTEL#, #KUNWE#, #VKORG#, #VTWEG#, #SPART#, #VBELN#, #POSNR#, #ZSTAT1#, #ZSTAT2#, #ZSTAT3#, #ZSTAT4#, #ZLOG1#, #ZLOG2#, #ZLOG3#, #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #LZONE#, #ZCANC#, #ZKNUM#, #ZKNUM2#, '', '', '', '', #MATKL#, SUBSTR(CAST(#ZKNUM# AS VARCHAR(12)),1,8) )
